products.name: Peanut Laddu
products.description: Rich & nutty roasted peanut laddoos with pure ghee
products.fullDescription: Delicious and nutritious peanut laddoos made with roasted peanuts, pure ghee, and natural jaggery. Perfect for snacking and energy boost.

products.name: Khajur (Dates) Laddu
products.description: Sweet dates and ghee combination, naturally sugary
products.fullDescription: Premium dates laddoos made with finest quality dates, pure ghee, and a touch of cardamom. No added sugar needed due to natural sweetness of dates.

products.name: Tulsi Laddu
products.description: Herbal tulsi-infused laddoos for immunity boost
products.fullDescription: Specially crafted tulsi laddoos with immunity-boosting properties. Made with fresh tulsi leaves, pure ghee, and natural ingredients.

products.name: Beet Root Laddu
products.description: Colorful and nutritious beet laddoos, iron-rich
products.fullDescription: Naturally colored beetroot laddoos packed with iron and antioxidants. Perfect for blood health and overall wellness.

products.name: Ashwagandha Laddu
products.description: Stress relief and vitality boosting herbal laddoos
products.fullDescription: Powerful adaptogenic ashwagandha laddoos formulated to reduce stress, improve sleep, and enhance overall vitality.

products.name: Shatawari Laddu
products.description: Women's wellness herbal laddoos, traditionally revered
products.fullDescription: Traditional Ayurvedic Shatavari laddoos specially formulated for women's health, hormonal balance, and overall wellness.

products.name: Moringa Laddu
products.fullDescription: Supercharged moringa laddoos loaded with 92 nutrients. Perfect for daily nutrition and overall wellness.

products.name: Millet Laddu
products.description: Ancient grain millet laddoos, gluten-free nutrition
products.fullDescription: Wholesome millet-based laddoos made from ancient grains. Naturally gluten-free and packed with essential minerals and fiber.

products.name: Baby Cereal Laddu
products.description: Gentle nutrition for little ones, from 8 months
products.fullDescription: Carefully crafted laddoos suitable for babies from 8 months. Made with mild cereals, pure ghee, and no allergenic ingredients.

products.name: Ragi Laddu
products.description: Finger millet laddoos, calcium and iron enriched
products.fullDescription: Calcium-rich ragi (finger millet) laddoos perfect for bone health and iron content. Ideal for all age groups.

products.name: Sesame Til Laddu
products.description: Til-rich laddoos for warmth and wellness
products.fullDescription: Traditional sesame laddoos loaded with calcium and healthy fats. Perfect for winter wellness.

products.name: Coconut Laddu
products.description: Tropical coconut laddoos with subtle sweetness
products.fullDescription: Delightful coconut laddoos made with fresh coconut, pure ghee, and natural jaggery. Aromatic and delicious.
